source.full-citation: Crevels, M. & van der Voort, H. (2008). The Guaporé‐Mamoré region as a linguistic area. In Muysken,P.(eds.), From linguistic areas to areal linguistics. Amsterdam: John Benjamins Pub. Co.
Jolkesky, M. P. d. V. (2010). Reconstrução Fonológica e Lexical do Proto-Jê Meridional. Master Dissertation, Universidade Estadual de Campinas.

Moore, D. & Vilacy Galucio, A. (1994). Reconstruction of Proto-Tupari consonants and vowels. In Langdon, M. (eds.), Survey of California and Other Indian Languages, Report 8. 119-30, Columbus: Ohio State University.
da Silva Sinha, V. & Cronhamn, S. (2013). Fieldwork data from Amazonian languages. Native speaker: Joaquim
da Silva Sinha, V. & Cronhamn, S. (2013). Fieldwork data from Amazonian languages. Native speaker: Kaman
da Silva Sinha, V. & Cronhamn, S. (2013). Fieldwork data from Amazonian languages. Native speaker: Nanblá
da Silva Sinha, V. & Cronhamn, S. (2013). Fieldwork data from Amazonian languages. Native speaker: Páltu
da Silva Sinha, V. & Cronhamn, S. (2013). Fieldwork data from Amazonian languages. Native speaker: Wary
Price, D. (1978). The Nambiquara Linguistic Family. In Anthropological Linguistics, Vol. 20, No. 1, pp. 14-37. Published by: Trustees of Indiana University.

Ribeiro, E. R. & van der Voort, H. (2010). Nimuendajú Was Right: The Inclusion of the Jabutí Language Family in the Macro-Jê Stock. In Vilacy Galucio, A. & Gildea, S. (eds.), International Journal of American Linguistics, Vol. 76, No. 4, pp. 517-570. Published by: The University of Chicago Press.
Sampaio, W. & da Silva Sinha, V. (2011). Fieldwork data from languages in Rondônia.

van der Voort, H. (2005). Kwaza in a Comparative Perspective. In International Journal of American Linguistics, Vol. 71, No. 4 (October 2005), pp. 365-412. Published by: The University of Chicago Press.
van der Voort, H. (2007). Proto-Jabutí: um primeiro passo na reconstrução da língua ancestral dos Arikapú e Djeoromitxí. In Boletim do Museu Paraense Emílio Goeldi (Ciências humanas) 2 (2):133-168.
source.note: English title: "Proto-Jabutí: a first attempt to reconstruct the ancestral language of the Arikapú and the Djeoromitxí."

source.full-citation: van der Voort, H. (2008). Interethnic contact in the Guaporé region and its linguistic consequences. Talk given in Lund 2008-06-03.
